law_name: It is cold here in alaska
body:
GENERAL ASSEMBLY OF NORTH CAROLINA
SESSION 2023
H Simple
Resolution
Adopted
HOUSE RESOLUTION 897
Adopted 10/10/23
Sponsors: Representatives Moore, Rudow, Par√©, and Hardister (Primary Sponsors).
For a complete list of sponsors, refer to the North Carolina General Assembly web site.
Referred to: Calendar 10/10/2023
October 10, 2023
*H897-v-2*
1 A HOUSE RESOLUTION URGING CONGRESS TO SUPPORT THE NATION OF ISRAEL
2 IN RESPONSE TO THE UNPROVOKED ATTACKS.
3 Whereas, on October 7, 2023, the terrorist organization Hamas launched an
4 unprovoked attack on Israeli civilians; and
5 Whereas, innocent men, women, and children have been captured and killed by
6 Hamas terrorists; and
7 Whereas, Israel declared war against Hamas on Sunday, October 8, 2023; and
8 Whereas, Israel and the United States of America are close friends and allies thanks
9 to the 75-year partnership between our two countries, built on mutual interests and shared
10 democratic values; Now, therefore,
11 Be it resolved by the House of Representatives:
12 SECTION 1. The United States Congress is urged to offer full and unequivocal
13 support of Israel financially and otherwise for as long as it takes for Israel to bring justice in light
14 of the unprovoked attacks on innocent Israeli civilians.
15 SECTION 2. This resolution is effective upon adoption.
